data.Question: Capability to host data locally (e.g. specific countries with regulatory constraints)
data.Commentaire: No on-premise hosting, but local cloud hosting can be studied, taking into account the international regulatory context

data.Question: Data encryption at rest
data.Commentaire: Managed by our company, no customer key management

data.Question: Capability to anonymize data in non-production environments
data.Commentaire: Production data is not used outside the production environment. Test servers provided to clients function in the same manner

data.Question: Interface security
data.Commentaire:
HTTPS + SAML
Strong TOTP authentication possible at clients' choice
API: filtering possible only on dedicated server (optional) and daily quota
No standard connector
Custom REST API
API key managed by clients

Data concerned: all application data

data.Question: If SaaS: Single or Multi-Tenant Architecture
data.Commentaire:
Multi-tenant by default (isolation: application access control)
Single Tenant as option (dedicated server)

data.Question: Compliance with security standards, certifications, affiliations...
data.Commentaire: ISO27001:2022 certification in progress. Phase 2 audit planned for 2025

data.Question: Capability to address certain GDPR requirements
data.Commentaire:
A DPO has been appointed, reachable at dedicated address
Retention and deletion duration not configurable. Personal data and information are kept 60 days after contract end in the platform.
At user's first connection, T&Cs must be accepted (point regarding personal data processing).
No tracking cookies used

data.Question: Capability to provide on client demand proofs/material elements on security level of project scope
data.Commentaire: SAP, ISSP and/or annual pentest summary

data.Question: MFA (second authentication factor) for local platform accounts (e.g. administration accounts)
data.Commentaire: TOTP MFA possibility if SAML not used

data.Question: Capability to log actions (access, modification, deletion) on data and infrastructures (environments, databases, etc.)
data.Commentaire: The solution generates logs on activities performed by users (creation, modification, deletion). Logs kept 3 years or until contract end

data.Question: Business continuity plan (BCP) existing and functional (tested) on project scope
data.Commentaire: Our SAP (ICT preparation for business continuity part) describes our commitments on this subject. All our hosting infrastructures are ISO27001 certified, to guarantee best practices, particularly on continuity and recovery topics. Additionally, we maintain a BCP and DRP to ensure service continuity. These plans are tested regularly

data.Question: Disaster recovery plan (DRP) existing and functional (tested) on project scope
data.Commentaire: Our SAP (ICT preparation for business continuity part) describes our commitments on this subject. All our hosting infrastructures are ISO27001 certified, to guarantee best practices, particularly on continuity and recovery topics. Additionally, we maintain a BCP and DRP to ensure service continuity. These plans are tested regularly

data.Question: Guaranteed service availability
data.Commentaire: 99% over 12 rolling months (see SLA Annex of our T&Cs)

data.Question: Data backup
data.Commentaire: We perform daily full backups kept 30 days offsite (see "Information backup" section of our SAP). The procedure is as follows: restoration request to support team, technical and support team evaluation, if applicable, data restoration
